NAME: TAIEX Expert mission on Navigation Services and Software Safety Assurance (DSF) in Aviation
BENEFICIARY: the former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia
AIMASSISTANCE:
Training for local staff for implementation of new  
 
 Regulative: 391/2013  
             Laying down a performance scheme for air navigation services and network functions  
 
 Regulative: 1108/2009 + New EASA Regulation  
             Extending EASA Remit to Airports, ATM and ANS  
 
Regulative  1035/2011, 1034/2011  
             Common Requirements for the Provision of Air Navigation Services  
 
Regulative: 552/2004  
            Interoperability of the European ATM Network  
 
Regulative: 482/2008  
            Software Safety Assurance in ATM  
 
The requirement for implementation is specified in  European Single Sky Implementation Plan ESSIP\LSSIP . 
The Training shall provide to participants short introduction how to implement regulations.
BENEFICIARYINSTITUTION: Ministry of Transport and Communications / Macedonian Air Navigation Service Provide
COORGANISERLOGISTIC: Mr Slavcho Gorcheski Macedonian Air Navigation Service Provider Data Processing Systems Advisor str Bosfor 7  1047 Mralino the former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia +38923148236 goran.temoski@mtc.gov.mk
